title: Enjoy Exciting Walkability Near Greenway Plaza & Upper Kirby Shopping!
posting_body: Gourmet kitchens and wide-open living spaces will make you feel right at home.
Every unit includes a full-size washer and dryer for your convenience.

Experience the resident clubhouse featuring two fully-loaded fitness centers, cardio room, gaming rooms with billiards and cafe seating, multiple lounge areas, refreshment bar, e-lounge with computers and a printer, and more.
Beautifully landscaped outdoor spaces offer two resort-style swimming pools, outdoor gaming, grilling stations, and a putting green.
This is a pet friendly community!
The neighborhood of Greenway-Upper Kirby is located conveniently close to Downtown, and is home to a large selection of museums, art galleries, dining, shopping, and entertainment.
Call today to schedule a tour!
•	Utility Room* with Full-Size Washer and Dryer
•	Indoor Lounge Areas and Refreshment Bar
•	Multiple Gaming Rooms with Billiards and Cafe Seating
•	Two Resort-Style Swimming Pools with Spas
•	Poolside Grilling Cabanas with Patio Dining
•	Manicured Courtyard and Zen Garden with Water Features
•	Two Parking Garages and Guest Parking Available
•	On-Site Pizza Cafe and Wine Bar
*pricing subject to change daily and is based upon the move-in date and lease term*
